title: Crashing Waves
description: After a tragic accident, Pro Surfer, Rory Eden, spends her days hiding in the surf and snowboard manufacturing company that she built from the ground up, while living her life as a shell of the person that she once was. Rory's world is turned upside when a young surfer pursues her, asking for the one thing she can't do. Realizing that this woman may be able revive the part of her soul that died in the accident, Rory reluctantly agrees to help her. This story takes you from the waves on the beaches of California, Gold Coast, Australia, and Bonzai Pipeline in Oahu, Hawaii, to the snow covered mountains of Colorado and Stockholm, Sweden.Adler Troy and Dr. Cason Macauley from Graysen Morgen's best seller, Falling Snow, make an appearance in this romantic adventure about life, love, and letting go.
author: Graysen Morgen
